languages.text: Направив туда разведчиков, Лорд-капитан быстро обнаружил{mf||а} логова мятежников. Осознав, что конец близок, повстанцы скопились в лагерях и приготовились к последней обороне.

traits.locale_text: Направив туда разведчиков, Лорд-капитан быстро обнаружил{mf||а} логова мятежников. Осознав, что конец близок, повстанцы скопились в лагерях и приготовились к последней обороне.

languages.text: After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.
languages.original_text: Направив туда разведчиков, Лорд-капитан быстро обнаружил{mf||а} логова мятежников. Осознав, что конец близок, повстанцы скопились в лагерях и приготовились к последней обороне.

traits.locale_text: After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.
After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.
After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.
After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.

languages.text: 当該地域に斥候部隊を送った後間もなくして、ロード・キャプテンが反乱軍の潜伏場所を発見した。状況が終結しつつあるのを感じとり、反乱軍はこのキャンプに集まって最後の抵抗に向けた準備をしていた。
languages.original_text: After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.

traits.locale_text: 当該地域に斥候部隊を送った後間もなくして、ロード・キャプテンが反乱軍の潜伏場所を発見した。状況が終結しつつあるのを感じとり、反乱軍はこのキャンプに集まって最後の抵抗に向けた準備をしていた。

languages.text: 舰长大人向这片地区派出了侦察兵，很快就找到了叛军的藏身之处。叛乱分子意识到大势已去，于是聚集在营地里，准备做最后的顽抗。
languages.original_text: After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人向这片地区派出了侦察兵，很快就找到了叛军的藏身之处。叛乱分子意识到大势已去，于是聚集在营地里，准备做最后的顽抗。

languages.text: Tras enviar una partida de exploración a la región, {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán} no tardó en hallar el escondrijo de los rebeldes. Presintiendo que su fin estaba próximo, los rebeldes se atrincheraron en sus campamentos y se aprestaron para librar una última batalla.
languages.original_text: After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.

traits.locale_text: Tras enviar una partida de exploración a la región, {mf|el Lord Capitán|la Lord Capitán} no tardó en hallar el escondrijo de los rebeldes. Presintiendo que su fin estaba próximo, los rebeldes se atrincheraron en sus campamentos y se aprestaron para librar una última batalla.

languages.text: Nachdem der Lord Captain Späher in diese Gegend entsandt hatte, entdeckte er rasch das Versteck der Rebellen. Als diese spürten, dass das Ende nahte, sammelten sie sich in ihren Lagern und bereiteten sich auf ein letztes Gefecht vor.
languages.original_text: After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem der Lord Captain Späher in diese Gegend entsandt hatte, entdeckte er rasch das Versteck der Rebellen. Als diese spürten, dass das Ende nahte, sammelten sie sich in ihren Lagern und bereiteten sich auf ein letztes Gefecht vor.

languages.text: Après avoir envoyé des éclaireurs dans la zone en question, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne tarda pas à découvrir le repaire des rebelles. Ces derniers, sentant leur fin proche, se réunirent dans leurs camps pour préparer l'affrontement final.
languages.original_text: After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir envoyé des éclaireurs dans la zone en question, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ne tarda pas à découvrir le repaire des rebelles. Ces derniers, sentant leur fin proche, se réunirent dans leurs camps pour préparer l'affrontement final.

languages.text: İlgili bölgeye keşif erleri gönderildikten sonra Lord Kaptan, tez vakitte isyancıların sığınağının konumunu tespit etti. Sonlarının yakın olduğunu hisseden isyancılar, son bir savunma yapmak üzere kamplara toplandı.
languages.original_text: After sending scouts to that area, the Lord Captain quickly discovered the rebels' hideout. Sensing that the end was near, the rebels gathered in their camps and prepared to take a final stand.

traits.locale_text: İlgili bölgeye keşif erleri gönderildikten sonra Lord Kaptan, tez vakitte isyancıların sığınağının konumunu tespit etti. Sonlarının yakın olduğunu hisseden isyancılar, son bir savunma yapmak üzere kamplara toplandı.
